original_text: When her master got up in the morning, he opened the door. He was ready to continue his journey. He saw the woman who was his wife lying on the ground outside the door. She was trying to reach the door with her hands.
korean_text: 그의 주인이 일찍이 일어나 집 문을 열고 떠나고자 하더니 그 여인이 집 문에 엎드러져 있고 그의 두 손이 문지방에 있는 것을 보고

sentences.original_text: When her master got up in the morning
He was ready to continue his journey
lying on the ground outside the door
She was trying to reach the door with her hands
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀는 손으로 문에 닿으려고 애쓰고 있었다
